The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 December is 1,479,097 (2,627.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 01 December, there were 84,152 new confirmed cases (149.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 November, there were 99,179 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 15% (15,027 fewer cases).
